#include <stdio.h>

int main() {
	int n, x;
	while (scanf("%d", &n) == 1) {
		int a[1000], b[1000];
		int an = 0, bn = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			scanf("%d", &x);
			if (x%2 == 1)
				a[an++] = x;
			else
				b[bn++] = x;
		}
		for (int i = 0; i < an; i++)
			printf("%d%s", a[i], i == an-1 ? "" : " ");
		puts("");
		for (int i = 0; i < bn; i++)
			printf("%d%s", b[i], i == bn-1 ? "" : " ");
		puts("");
	}
	return 0;
}
